::Cygnar::
    He arrived at where the battle was supposed to be and found nothing 
except scorch marks and craters.  He scans the immediate area for any sign of 
Galvatron.  Unable to find anything he sends a message to Magmatron.  "Sir, I 
have arrived but the battle is no longer here.  What would you have me do 
now?"
